name: Tockify Events Calendar
author: Tockify Ltd

sections.description:
WordPress 5 and 6 Notice

WordPress 5 and 6 users should only use Tockify Plugin version 2.0.1 or later – preferably the latest version.

About Tockify Calendar

Tockify Calendar is a modern attractive web calendar with an engaging and easy to use design that’s perfect for the desktop and mobile web. It’s image rich, lightning fast, highly customizable and blends seamlessly into any site. Our simple yet powerful editor makes creating and managing events a joy.

As well as the main calendar there’s a mini-calendar that’s been carefully designed to work well in small spaces like a sidebar.

The Tockify WordPress plugin provides a WordPress shortcode and Widget that makes it easy to add your Tockify calendar to any WordPress site.

We also provide a Tockify Block for visual editing with WordPress 5.

This plugin can be used with both the free and the subscription editions of Tockify Calendar.

Tockify Calendar Features

  • Month, Agenda and Pinboard style layouts.
  • Attractive Mini Calendar widget that’s great for sidebars and other small spaces.
  • Highly customizable appearance.
  • Live sync with Google Calendar.
  • Social sharing to Facebook, Twitter etc.
  • Ticket/Call To Action buttons.
  • Embed Video from YouTube, Vimeo or Facebook.
  • Customizable RSVP forms.
  • Accept and approve community submitted events.
  • Simple, powerful editor with complex repeating events support and built in image cropping.
  • Built in tag and text based search.
  • Built in maps and directions.
  • iCalendar support so people can subscribe with, for example, their phone’s built in calendar.
  • Continuous calendar backup.

  • Blends seamlessly into your site. Probably the world’s least widgetty widget.

    Language Support

    With the help of our community we’ve been able to make Tockify available in these languages:

    • French
    • German
    • Spanish
    • Portuguese
    • Dutch
    • Danish
    • Swedish
    • Norwegian
    • Polish
    • Italian
    • Finnish
    • Czech
    • Slovak
    • Slovenian
    • Romanian
    • Russian
    • Turkish
    • Greek
    • Arabic
    • Persian
    • Chinese (traditional)
    • Hebrew
    • Welsh
    • Korean
    • Catalan
    • Icelandic
    • Galacian
    • Faroese

If your language isn’t there yet and you’d like to help just contact us at support@tockify.com and together we’ll make it happen.
sections.installation:
This plugin lets you add a Tockify Calendar to your WordPress site so you’ll need a (free) Tockify Calendars account before you start. You can get one from the Tockify Website.

The easiest way to install the Tockify Calendar plugin is to log in to your WordPress dashboard, go to Plugins >> Add New, search for Tockify Calendar, and click to install. You can also download the zip file from this page and upload it from the Plugins >> Add New > Upload page.

More information and details about how to use the Tockify plugin and shortcode are on the Tockify Website’s WordPress Page
sections.faq:
1. Docs page on the Tockify Calendars website.
  2. FAQ page on the Tockify Calendars website.
  3. Tockify For WordPress page on the Tockify Calendars website.
  4. You can also contact support@tockify.com – we’re quick to respond!

sections.reviews:
Easy Install + Responsive Support Service

By traycycles on June 11, 2019

Thanks a bunch for your fast response! Lovely mini calendar fits nicely in sidebar. All instructions are very easy to follow.

Love it - best calendar design!

By petesthemann on February 5, 2019

A really well designed calendar with a clean, clear layout that's easy for people to understand and use. I design websites and have used this on a few different sites now with great success. The built in no-css customiser means I can do most of the design myself then hand over to my customers so that they can tweak everything themselves without a lot of back and forth between us. Appreciated the quick support too - can't recommend enough!

This is not plugin and very hard to use...

By 18TommyBoy on January 29, 2019

Date can´t be set like Slovak format (28.01.2019) only English (01/28/2019)

Not a plugin!

By joeyissteel on November 13, 2018

What - this just adds an "embedded" calendar window to my site! Is this even allowed on WordPress?

Terrific Customer Service

By harpern619 on December 19, 2017

I downloaded a trial version of Tockify to try it out on my site. I had several questions related to RSVP functionality, user access, and general formatting. I exchanged multiple emails with Robert and he was super prompt, helpful, and friendly. And this was all while I was only a free trial subscriber! I have since become a paid subscriber and will be for a long time. I researched a lot of calendars and this one has by far the best balance between beauty, user-friendliness, and functionality. And it's crazy cheap! Thank you Robert for a great product and for knowing how to treat people!

Awesome calendar

By chepicker on August 13, 2017

Awesome calendar with awesome support! I've used this calendar for years but only recently moved to Wordpress. I tried a few other WP Calendars to see what's available but this is still the best option. For a non-coder like me the ability to do heavy customization without CSS is an especially big deal. Keep up the good work guys!

Great Calendar, simple and flexible

By ejwjohn on October 30, 2016

This is my first implementation of the Tockify calendar with Word Press and it does not disappoint, i have used previously on non word press sites. The support is very quick when you need it thx John

Super Easy Install/Use All Features I Need (including video!)

By hothotsun on September 3, 2016

Tockify has provided the calendar of my dreams - I have been in the events calendar publishing business for 14 years and even had my own software/portal designed to store and display events the way I needed. Tockify gives me the ability to easily include photos, videos, links and button plus all the info I want in each listing. The tags/categories make it super easy for readers and clients to find what they need. The choice of layouts (agenda, pinboard and monthly) make all the info easy to see/use in the format best suited to the info.

The monthly cost is very reasonable and the support has been superior. I have had every email inquiry answered in a quick and informative fashion and have been able to do everything I wanted in my calendars (I have four!) as a result.

Nice folks, amazing product = happy me!

Katrina Sherk
Active Moms Blog

Pinboard not free feature $96 yr, deceptive

By Curtis (salsaFire) on September 3, 2016

So, it's $96 a year to have the pinboard view that's in the featured image of the plugin and listed as a featured item for the plugin.

However, there is no mention of any cost on the page. Seems like more than a simple oversight. My first, and hopefully only 1 star rating. boo.

Satisfied!!

By kamilkabat on September 3, 2016

I am very satisfied with stability of calendar. I use it with WP and check almost all calendar plugins. Only this is stable with the theme I use.
Kamil

short_description: Tockify Calendar is a modern attractive website calendar. Beautiful. Intuitive. Super-Customizable. Lightning Fast.

upgrade_notice.1.2: • You can now live sync with Google Calendar to use Tockify as an attractive front end to an existing Google calendar. It's also now possible to embed the mini-calendar using the shortcode (previously it was only available as a widget)

upgrade_notice.1.1: • The new Mini Calendar widget lets you add a Tockify calendar to your sidebar or anywhere else a widget can go. It's designed to look good in small spaces
